alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 3:19AM CDT until April 05 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CRAWFORD...BARTON AND NORTHWESTERN JASPER COUNTIES... At 318 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pittsburg, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public. Quarter size hail was reported south of Pittsburg. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Pittsburg, Prairie State Park, Lamar, Frontenac, Arma, Jasper, Golden City, Liberal, Mulberry, Nashville, Mindenmines, Franklin, Arcadia, Asbury, Lamar Heights, Waco, Irwin, Burgess, Milford and Croweburg. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 55 and 76. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
